live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47094.summary: Some customers in the Grandview-Woodland area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47094.title: Feb 23 - Vancouver (Grandview Woodland ) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
